name: Burg_154
culture_notes: Dialect: Coastal Tongues variant with nautical slang
Cuisine: salted fish, seaweed preserves, fermented shellfish
Customs: nightly tide-offerings and small ancestor-safety rites before voyages
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no long-range mind-control or instant resurrection
notes: population unknown; functions as minor coastal stop and ritual supply point
limited defensive works; reliant on natural harbor and armed boats
